title: Fallout TV Show Trailer Live Reaction - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.07.24
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off polarized sunglasses.

This show is sponsored by BetterHelp - go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.  

Blessing and Tim react to the new Fallout trailer, recap the Xbox Partner Direct, and look through the BAFTA game award nominees.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:57 - Housekeeping
 - The Xcast’s reaction to yesterday’s Xbox Partner Preview is up with a new podcast episode accompanying it. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
       -  The Roper Report   -
00:07:04 - Fallout TV Show Trailer Reaction
00:16:09 - BAFTA Games Awards 2024 nominations have been announced
00:30:04 - Everything announced at the March 2024 Xbox Partner Preview
00:45:35 - Wee News!
00:50:10 - SuperChats
00:54:59 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Bless
